attributes.action: give Bernard Cribbins a knighthood for services to the entertainment business
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Bernard Cribbins is a legend and a British entertainment treasure and should be treated as such.  This talented and well loved actor, musician, comedian and all round top bloke deserves to be honoured for his services to toe entertainment business.

rejection.details:
The Cabinet Office is actively seeking nominations for honours. See:

http://www.direct.gov.uk/en/Governmentcitizensandrights/UKgovernment/Honoursawardsandmedals/DG_067917
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
